text: Teuma takarat ampon bak Allah Talakee ampon bak Tuhan gata Lom ngon churuga keubon nyang luah Langet ngon bumoe luah jih meunan Keu ureueng mukmin bandum geukeubah Iman keu Tuhan ngon rasul Tuhan Bandum atra nyan karonya Allah Soe nyang hâ€˜eut Tuhan Neubri atra nyan Karonya Tuhan raya sileupah
